arts.ttl: Connor Roberts denied reunion with Leeds United after injury blow
arts.sum: Leeds United return from the international break this weekend when they face Burnley at Turf Moor. Daniel Farke and Scott Parker clash once again after a fierce promotion battle to the wire last season. Both sides finished level on points, but Leeds’ superior goal difference saw them lift the Championship on the final day. arts.ttl: Two ruled out, with one major doubt – Daniel Farke confirms team news for Burnley game
arts.sum: Leeds United are back in action this weekend as they take on Scott Parker’s Burnley side. The Clarets have been a thorn in the side of Daniel Farke’s career – the German has just one win against them in England. Last season, Leeds failed to beat Burnley in two games in the Championship.
